snippet: A three-year, 300-billion-euro effort to spur the European economy won broad backing from finance ministers.
abstract: European Union finance ministers endorse plans to leverage hundreds of billions of euros to finance new infrastructure projects and spur demand as part of effort to avoid economic stagnation; they direct the European Commission and the European Investment Bank to present initial plans.
lead_paragraph: A three-year, 300-billion-euro effort to spur the European economy won broad backing from finance ministers.

headline.main: European Finance Ministers Support Investment Program
headline.print_headline: European Finance Ministers Support Investment Program
